# The `MemoryInstructionDependences` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

For each memory instruction, this class maintains difference of the number of unsafe dependences that start out from this instruction minus those that end here. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

For each memory instruction, this class maintains difference of the number of unsafe dependences that start out from this instruction minus those that end here.

By traversing the memory instructions in program order and accumulating this number, we know whether any unsafe dependence crosses over a program point.

Definition at line 608 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdistribute-cpp">LoopDistribute.cpp</a>.
